cause.description:
This organization is all about informing the United States and the World about multiple sclerosis. The impact it has on people's lives is very great so we are trying to make people aware s that something can be done. We are trying to raise money for research to find a cure for multiple sclerosis.
1. People must be informed about multiple sclerosis and how it impacts people's lives
cause.mission: To Help Support a Cure for Multiple Sclerosis
cause.name: MS Research
